title: Springsteel completed: a limited time special
content:
One-third off Springsteel to celebrate the release of Light and Heavy cuts. Springsteel Light & Italic are free! Get them at [Myfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20120710151618/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/paragraph/springsteel/).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120710151618im_/http:/typophile.com/files/springs-compl-special_4910.png)
author: paragraph
